name: py-snakemake-storage-plugin-azure

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: A Snakemake storage plugin to read and write from Azure Blob Storage.

dependencies.name: py-azure-core
dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Core Library for Python.

dependencies.name: py-azure-identity
dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Identity Library for Python.

dependencies.name: py-azure-storage-blob
dependencies.description: Microsoft Azure Blob Storage Client Library for Python

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-common
dependencies.description: Common functions and classes for Snakemake and its plugins.

dependencies.name: py-snakemake-interface-storage-plugins
dependencies.description:
This package provides a stable interface for interactions between
Snakemake and its storage plugins.

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
